replies.body:
What do we want?
Poro themed ward skins!
When do we want them?
Now!
the problem with a poro ward is, what happens if the enemy finds the ward and wants to get rid of it?

They shoot next to the Poro, so the poro dodges the projectiles, possibly having little squeak sound effects each time.  After the final hit, the Poro digs a hole and squeezes in, in an attempt to hide itself.  Instead of the usual 'ward breaking' sound effect, the final noise would be a loud disgruntled squeak (or whatever noise you use to describe Poro noises).  :D
**I WOULD PAY 1350 RP FOR THIS**. {{item:2052}}
I BID 90000 RP AND URF WW LVL 10 ACC
This is actually pretty good... Or instead of digging a whole the Poro could wander around the map for a while :D Think about it... POROS EVERYWHERE!

YES.  They no longer give sight, but they can still exist.  Possible game-ending distraction:  They can be herded by players.  

I would pay all of my money to be able to herd Poros around.  This could even be enabled on Summoner's Rift as a Featured Game Mode...  
**-=In order to make this possible=-  **

Instead of becoming mobile on a Poro-ward's destruction, a Poro is spawned at the time of its placement.  
**=Objective=**  
Get as many Ward-Poros as possible from your side of the map to the enemy's.  First team to herd X number into the enemy base wins.  
**=What makes it hard=**  
1.) Poros do not want to be herded.  They will initially be faster than the ones on Howling Abyss though they slow down to that speed over time, and they will move erratically away from your champion.  They will always move away from an approaching champion, never back towards one.  
2.) There will also be an enemy team trying to herd their own Poros into your base.  Stop them and steal their Poros for your own team.  
3.) Towers will deal reduced damage to champions, but will still cause trouble for a champion attempting to charge straight down a lane.  
4.) Using biscuit-potions produced by the 'Biscuiteer' mastery point will cause Poros to temporarily be attracted to the champion with the biscuit's effect.  Attracted Poros will not run from the affected champion, instead they will follow it for a short time.  


I just made a game mode for something that doesn't even exist.  It's time to log off here for a bit, I think.  Go do actual work...  >_>

What if there was a new system for trinks or wards where u can just "deploy" a poro that wanders around the map. 
It's like a moving dynamic ward giving vision of what it fucking pleases, wherever it decided to go... could be fun to see what a poro could unveil before the enemies notice it and scare it down the hole.
Riot pls. replace THIS instead of the sightstone's crappy ruby upgrade!
What if Braum has to kill it? o.o

Seeing as the Poro-ward isn't really killed, I don't see that being an issue.  Although it could also open up another special action...  Instead of attempting to hit the Poro directly, he uses a corner of his shield to help it dig a tunnel, then quietly shoos it away to safety.
I think that when Braum takes the executing kill, he should look both ways and then put the poro behind his shield
They would run up and give it a hug, who would get rid of a poro..
They would attempt to feed it a poro snack of course!         {{item:2009}}
That was not a poro snack :p {{item:2052}} this is
If they have a poro snack, they can feed it to make it their ward
RITO DO THIS AND I WILL FORGIVE YOU FOR NOT TITLING BRAUM AS "PROTECTOR OF POROS"
Omg... He should definitely be the defender of poros. You should apply for Riot's creative team. (No sarcasm)
seriously though he should be label'd that.
I'd purchase an animated Poro ward.
Please, oh please, Ritooo. I'll give you a {{item:2052}} :3
They should make Braums trinkets have a poro effect.
I would buy.
This is a million dollar idea!
Since I animated both Poro and Draven I have to vote for Dravo! Well done, you foresaw the mustache before it became reality.
Poroven, Poro's with mustache and axes.
I thought of this a couple months ago and I have wanted nothing more for a long time

These adorable things are melting my {{item:3110}} 
>3<
Poro Rider{{champion:113}} OR Poro Queen {{champion:60}} where she has poros following her instead of spiders.... along with some other poro stuffs
So... Just googled Poro-images to set as my desktop backround, So much Poro porn..why god...why... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

apparently when you type "Poro" into Google, Google says "hey yeah you wanted Poros right?" But when you type in "Poro gifs" into Google, Google's like "i think you misspelled Porno gifs" {{item:3073}}
That's because Poro is a hentai artist who has been around a lot longer than Riot has. T(he)y probably have done more animations than Riot has Champions :/
ALL the champions should get their own poros that look like them when they're on Howling Abyss.
#Poro Ward Skin

No no no. What we NEED is when we place the Ward skin it summons a poro that will sit in that spot and look around. BUT it will be the first Ward skin EVER to be able to walk around the area that is lit up. :D cmon guys how amazing would this be?
Except then the enemy team would just look for a poro to figure out if the spot was warded... :{

But Poro is invisible to enemy until revealed. Unless off course it's the pink.
{{item:2043}}
Here are some League of Legends wood burnings I have done-including a Poro of course!!  http://sharkb8oohhaha.imgur.com/all/
You sir, deserve more upvotes than I can give. Those are exceptional.
Why do these poro snax taste like poro?
Shhhhhhhh, don't ask questions you don't want the answers to.
Soylent-snax is Poro. IT'S PORO!!!
Maybe riot will make Poros with wings flying around the howling abyss next. {{item: 3026}}

ok hear me out here i got an idea

poro capture the flag style setup. instead of a nexus its a small pen with poros in it. still have field towers and outer base towers but no nexus tower. each teams goal is to capture the three enemy poros in the pen. you run up grab one poro now all your spells and b force you to drop poro who then wanders in a circle where dropped. enemy team can return poro by grabing him and running home to pen. nexus will be your poro spawn point and shop will be poro drop off area

there you go riot an idea now role with it
Sir i am not liking your name atm Poros should never be nerfed {{item:3070}}
Poros should be buffed!
